ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: if(NOT(ISNEW()),if( FS_Execution_Plan__r.FS_Execution_Plan_Final_Approval_PMCheck__c,if(OR($Profile.Name = "FS AC_P", $Profile.Name = "FS PM_P", $Profile.Name = "FS Admin PM_P", $Profile.Name = "FET System Admin", $Profile.Name = "System Administrator", $Profile.Name = "FS FPS_P"),false,true),false),false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Equipment Package cannot be updated after Execution Plan has been approved. Please Contact your PM for any necessary edits.
